body:
So funny man, they really got us in the first half not gonna lie.
So she didn do a thing with anyone else during those 3 years, became that lewd, and even said things like you r the only one who I did raw with...bro, that makes me think she did it with other people, but not raw, but in the end she said she havent done it with anyone else and stayed faithful to him during all that time? 
Damn, these authors really like to make thigs confuse
Hah gottem
Lmao, Yamcha at Page 8
well damn, i was about to start Armaggedon on thise shit if i didnt read it whole
My man got shafted in a good way

I really couldn't enjoy this one. The entire time reading this, all I could think of was: "This SOB raped her!" and then she's cheating on her fiance with him. Then she's lied about this marriage, along with the family, and I'm supposed to see this as wholesome? The art is great, but I can't fap to this.
They had us in the first half, ngl
they had us in the first half, not gonna lie.
My luck today with picking wholesome doujins is just too much I might have drainmy luck for the rest of the week
Coincidentally, I've read too many wholesome doujins today. I think might die tomorrow
good story, didn't have to be the cousin though. REALLY REALLY didn't need to be the cousin
Damn I was in tears
Fap? Shit had me on edge the whole time.

I seriously don't know which one should I believe now. He's the only she's done raw with implying she had.. with someone else or she's being faithful. Both said by her. The dude tho. I'm not sure whether that "ehh" is because he's busted or just speechless bcuz of jer suspicion. Either way the fact that it took 3 years when the feeling is mutual sucks so bad. Dude lost his balls but the girl know about the misunderstanding yet she don't wanna reach to him as if they can only interact when he come to her place.
Wholesome.

Judging from the last page, she prob lied about having sex with others just like she lied about gettting married. Pretty sure she just trying to make him feel less guilty about doing it with her and as the final blow leading him take responsibility for being the only one ever finishing inside.
Credit where it’s due, that was a really good bait and switch. Made me uncomfortable leading up to it, but that felt like the point. 9/10

Honestly.. the words she was using while initiating sex .. seemed to me like she trying to make him understand what he had done to her..
Example: "You always just want to take someone else's right?" Like she's saying you like to break others' relationship right? And when he asked that she's about to get married and she's like "oh please as you care about that" like saying "if you would care about someone who's in a relationship before having sex with them etc.. maybe I'm just reading too much into it
ok
DAAAAAMN NIGGA GOT GOT
Wait what? Whole family is ok cousin fucking and conceiving thats wholesome. Also that last pannel with the him going to other sluts is funny af
that was cute
This is a chaotic type of wholesomeness tbh
what a strat

I dont know why i didnt really liked it but the story has so many holes and after everything that happend to wait THREE fucking years until reaching out is a bit too much for me. Couldve used a few more panels to clear everything up.

I mean he took her virginity kinda by force (even so she didnt say no when he asked her) but with that guilt he felt after seeing her crying he moved away and while she knew his feelings towards her she left him with that feeling alone for THREE YEARS, thats 1095 days, thats 26,280 hours ffs and yet she didnt even reach out to him be herself but forced him to come visit her before her "Wedding"...

Eh so much wasted potential
6/10 "I don't know why I kinda didn't like it"
Oh wtf I was so scared
This was a real trip I wasn’t expecting that surprise wholesome at the end but it was extremely welcome
this was crazy yet so good; it was the surprise wholesomeness that got to me
Jesus christ this is wholesome af
So that was a fucking rollercoaster lol
First cousin ero manga
need 2nd after story for this. Love this
I finally found this gem again, great story
the rape in the beggining ruins this one for me
Well... That's one way to get married

I bet the guy was the one who confessed to Chitose and she accepted as she wanted to experience how to be in a relationship and they've only been dating for around a week when they have their first kiss she realizes that the one she's in love is her cousin that's why she dumped the guy. She waited for her cousin to show up to confess her feelings as he's been avoiding her thus we get this story.
@7ETHER. Nope. She has only done it w/ Arata. She's only teasing him to man up since she knew that Arata needs pushing.  You can tell by how she speaks if you observe the conversation.
Amazing as always, homunculus

Marrying cousin is not incest. 
Change my mind.
To everyone saying how is the family okay with incest . That’s because in Japan it is socially acceptable to marry your cousin
Hahahaha wtf, for the first time i was fooled by ero doujin. i immediately turn off on the ending xD
SWEET HOME ALABAMA

This hentai got me frustrated yet happy at the same time, almost as if it's teasing me... ugh...

Damn you author! >;(
Wow if only my relationship with my cousin turned out like this we would still have been together... Sadly fiction is easier than real life relationships.
so the entire family is "okey-dokey" with incest? god fucking damn the japanese
Man, this comments scared the shet out of me, but I was positive and I had faith...

everything was a lie at the end (having sex with other guys during those 3 years) to set him up and make him take responsability like he said most likely, if you believe the bonus page, she actually was faithful to him for all that time it passed, but not the same can be say about the guy i suppose with that last reply.
@K kun that guy is the one who kiss her at first. And she did with the other guys after arata run away... so, she want to do it more with him than with others in the past. Do you understand?
its just a lie because the page 19 was said "since we started , so many time ive been...." i guess she want to said "masturbate" #quick.analysis
Hahahaha i like this story
she only have sex with arata :v since she said she never be touched by that guy :> i guess shes been masturbate for 3 years
those were all big lies guys, she even said she stayed faithful
More...i need moarrrrr

So she's been doing it with other guys since the last three years. While Arata's been up to something as well considering his reaction on the last page. They both were craving for each other but this doujin is wrong on so many levels. I seriously hate and love this at same time. It's just that I can't get over this feeling of cheating. I just wish this doujin would've never ended.
wholsome  >_<
The best want more
Dis one is awesome
This one's missing a bonus chapter.
What about an other guys she do it with condom?  XD
there are definitely these types of families...
"You're the only one I've done it with raw". That kinda implies that she did it with other guys, but with condoms during those 3 years. I could be wrong but that's what it sounds like to me.
Wew that was nice ending :^)
dude..... that broke me... i was expecting both of them to end together
page 24,when chitose said "that was a lie". damn arata,your pose..............is so elegant XD
this is faking funny XD
Holy shit, that was a rollercoaster of emotions! And everything went better than expected! If only they talked and cleared everything up earlier lol
got the lols and the bone!
this was nice.. wish there are more like this
